input.sentences: three little pumpkins went on a walk looking for the best place to take a rest .
first | they found a wooden floor . they said that it was too grainy .
next | one little pumpkin sat on a curb feeling sad .
another pumpkin sat on a statue hoping to feel some comfort .
then | all three of the pumpkins found a new statue that they could call their home !
output.sentences: Today we went for a walk through a pumpkin patch.
We found a variety of pumpkins and gords.
This little orange and green one looks so sad and alone.
I think I'll give him to this statue gentlemen.
Let's take the three of these pumpkins home.
